title: Font ID-Similar to Bree
content:
Hi guys i saw this video  
 [http://www.vimeo.com/3986148](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110307/http:/www.vimeo.com/3986148 "http://www.vimeo.com/3986148")  
 and i was wondering what font is used there...looks like Bree ...but isn’t that i think.  
Maybe is more that one font?  
I show you a screenshot.  
Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110307/http:/typophile.com/files/whatfont_9.jpg) | 37.98 KB |
author: SimoneCatania

comments.content: Find it! Is Ronnia basic. Very nice font especially the bold version.
Really! Your right! That’s why they look similar. Anyway, today i learned two more interesting things.. thank you!
